head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEINBERG, MURIEL K.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEINBERG, MURIEL K.

block.p: WEINBERG-Muriel K. of Dobbs Ferry on September 14, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Samuel (died July 30, 2000). Loving mother of Beth Rose of Boston, MA and Adam Weinberg of Dobbs Ferry. Devoted grandmother of three. Service today 1:00 p.m. EdwardsDowdle Funeral Home, 64 Ashford Av. (exit 17 Saw Mill) Dobbs Ferry
